mapper.select: select count(1) as cnt from (select wkb_geometry from ${tName} layer where 1=1 and not ST_isEmpty(wkb_geometry) and not ST_isEmpty(st_geomfromgeojson('${bjcdGeoms}')) and not ST_isEmpty(ST_Intersection(wkb_geometry, ST_SetSRID(st_geomfromgeojson('${bjcdGeoms}'),5179))) and (layer.create_dttm > to_timestamp(#{orderVersion}, 'YYYY.MM.DD hh24:mi:ss ') or layer.delete_dttm > to_timestamp(#{orderVersion}, 'YYYY.MM.DD hh24:mi:ss ')) limit 2) layer
